She specializes in creating beautiful, personalized looks that enhance each client's natural beauty.", + workingHours: "Tue - Sat, 9 AM - 5 PM", + address: "789 Karen Road, Karen" + }, + { + id: 4, + name: "Carlos Rodriguez", + specialty: "Beard Grooming", + rating: 4.7, + location: "Kiambu Town", + county: "Kiambu", + shopName: "Kiambu Barbers", + available: true, + experience: "5 years", + image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1500648767791-00dcc994a43e?w=300&h=300&fit=crop&crop=face", + price: "KSh 800-1,500", + phone: "+254 700 456 789", + email: "carlos@kiambubarbers.com", + services: [ + { name: "Beard Trim", price: 800, duration: "25 min", description: "Precision beard trimming and styling" }, + { name: "Haircut", price: 1000, duration: "30 min", description: "Professional haircut with wash and style" }, + { name: "Mustache Styling", price: 600, duration: "15 min", description: "Mustache trimming and styling" } + ], + reviews: 67, + bio: "Carlos Rodriguez specializes in beard grooming and traditional barbering techniques. With 5 years of experience, he's known for his meticulous attention to detail and traditional approach to grooming.", + workingHours: "Mon - Sat, 8 AM - 6 PM", + address: "321 Kiambu Road, Kiambu Town" + }, + { + id: 5, + name: "James Mwangi", + specialty: "Traditional Cuts", + rating: 4.5, + location: "Thika", + county: "Kiambu", + shopName: "Thika Classic Barbers", + available: true, + experience: "7 years", + image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1506794778202-cad84cf45f1d?w=300&h=300&fit=crop&crop=face", + price: "KSh 600-1,200", + phone: "+254 700 567 890", + email: "james@thikaclassic.com", + services: [ + { name: "Haircut", price: 600, duration: "30 min", description: "Professional haircut with wash and style" }, + { name: "Beard Trim", price: 500, duration: "20 min", description: "Precision beard trimming and styling" }, + { name: "Hair Wash", price: 300, duration: "15 min", description: "Professional hair wash and conditioning" } + ], + reviews: 45, + bio: "James Mwangi brings traditional barbering techniques with a modern touch.
